posts.post_content:
Well, it was a fun :) journey, but time to move on :(

What started as a Savannah player's collection, grew to the entire Series 1 set.  Then came the upgrades.

I don't feel Series 1 gets the "toughness" label it should, imo.:rolleyes:

Nice clean raw set.  Only a few creases, and backs are clean with only a few flecks.

This lot will not be split up (Mr. Viola, Manion, Lipe, Martina, etc. will stay with their teammates).

$7,000

[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks, Scott
